text: Adiemus may refer to: *Adiemus (albums), a series of albums of music composed by Karl Jenkins **Adiemus: Songs of Sanctuary, the first album of the series **"Adiemus" (song), the title track of the first album *Adiemus (ensemble), the group of Karl Jenkins, Mike Ratledge, and Miriam Stockley formed for Songs of Sanctuary
title: Adiemus
